mapper.insert: insert into bd_scoretables (tableid, mbmc, mcms, sfqy, lx, mf, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag) values (#{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bd_scoretables set mbmc = #{mbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mcms = #{mcms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfqy = #{sfqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lx = #{lx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mf = #{mf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tableid = #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tableid, mbmc, mcms, sfqy, lx, mf, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_scoretables where tableid = #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select tableid, mbmc, mcms, sfqy, lx, mf, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_scoretables
